title: Fix mobile app crashes during file upload
description: Users report frequent crashes when uploading files larger than 10MB on iOS and Android. Need to investigate memory management and add proper error handling.

title: Optimize dashboard loading performance
description: Dashboard takes 30+ seconds to load for users with large datasets. Need to implement pagination, lazy loading, and caching strategies.

title: Implement dark mode theme
description: Multiple customers requesting dark mode for better usability during night hours. Should include system preference detection and manual toggle.

title: Fix CSV export timeout errors
description: CSV export fails with timeout errors for reports with more than 10k rows. Need to implement chunked export or background job processing.

title: Improve search relevance and ranking
description: Current search doesn't return exact matches and ranking algorithm needs improvement. Consider implementing full-text search with proper scoring.

title: Add SSO/SAML integration
description: Enterprise customers require SSO for security compliance. Implement SAML 2.0 support with common identity providers (Okta, Azure AD, Google).

title: Increase API rate limits for enterprise
description: Current rate limits (100 req/min) are too restrictive for enterprise integrations. Need tiered rate limiting based on plan.

title: Optimize mobile app battery usage
description: Mobile app is consuming excessive battery. Need to profile and optimize background tasks, reduce polling frequency, and improve network efficiency.

title: Fix bulk import failures for large datasets
description: Bulk import fails for datasets over 10k records. Need to implement streaming import with progress tracking and error recovery.

title: Improve mobile responsive design for tablets
description: Current responsive design breaks on tablet devices. Need to add proper breakpoints and optimize layout for 7-12 inch screens.

title: Increase file upload size limit
description: Current 10MB limit is too restrictive. Users need to upload files up to 50MB (presentations, videos, large datasets).

title: Add API webhooks for real-time notifications
description: Customers need webhook support for real-time event notifications instead of polling. Implement webhook registration and delivery system.

title: Improve error handling for batch operations
description: Batch operations fail silently without clear error messages. Need to add proper error reporting, partial success handling, and retry logic.

title: Add advanced search filters and boolean operators
description: Power users need advanced search with boolean operators (AND, OR, NOT) and complex field filtering.

title: Support additional export formats (Excel, PDF)
description: Currently only CSV export is supported. Add Excel (.xlsx) and PDF export formats for better reporting capabilities.
